20-020SC.summary: Recommendation to receive a presentation from Long Beach Transit on their Sustainability Programs and Emissions Reductions.Commissioner Gaytan joined the meeting.Commissioner Tolkoff joined the meeting.Sara Baumann, Government Relations Officer, spoke; and provided a PowerPoint presentation.Vice Wheeler Chair spoke.Commissioner Tolkoff spoke.Commissioner Dillon spoke.Sara Baumann, Government Relations Officer, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Commissioner Dillon and Sara Baumann, Government Relations Officer.Commissioner Skye spoke.Sara Baumann, Government Relations Officer, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Commissioner Skye and Sara Baumann, Government Relations Officer.Commissioner Bergeron-Birge spoke.Sara Baumann, Government Relations Officer, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Commissioner Bergeron-Birge and Sara Baumann, Government Relations Officer.Commissioner Novak spoke.Vice Chair Wheeler spoke.Page 2 of 6VIA TELECONFERENCE, 4:00 PMTHURSDAY, OCTOBER 22, 2020CITY OF LONG BEACHSUSTAINABLE CITY COMMISSION MINUTESSara Baumann, Government Relations Officer, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Vice Chair Wheeler and Sara Baumann, Government Relations Officer.Commissioner Skye spoke.A motion was made by Commissioner Skye, seconded by Commissioner Bergeron-Birge, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 6 - Donna Bergeron-Birge, Carla Dillon, Jenny Novak, Alan Tolkoff, Coby Skye and Morgan WheelerAbsent: 4 - Hilda Gaytan, Rey Gonzales, Eric Rock and Sona Coffee2.

20-019SC.summary: Recommendation to receive a presentation from the Department of Public Works on the Municipal Urban Stormwater Treatment (LB-MUST) Project.Colin Averill, Civil Engineer, spoke; and provided a PowerPoint presentation.Vice Chair Wheeler spoke.Colin Averill, Civil Engineer, spoke.Lincoln Lo, Assistant City Engineer, spoke.Vice Chair Wheeler spoke.Commissioner Dillon spoke.Colin Averill, Civil Engineer, spoke.Commissioner Skye spoke.Commissioner Bergeron-Birge spoke.Colin Averill, Civil Engineer, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Commissioner Bergeron-Birge and Colin Page 3 of 6VIA TELECONFERENCE, 4:00 PMTHURSDAY, OCTOBER 22, 2020CITY OF LONG BEACHSUSTAINABLE CITY COMMISSION MINUTESAverill, Civil Engineer.Commissioner Gaytan spoke.Colin Averill, Civil Engineer, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Commissioner Gaytan and Colin Averill, Civil Engineer.Lincoln Lo, Assistant City Engineer, spoke.Commissioner Gaytan spoke. Commissioner Novak spoke. Colin Averill, Civil Engineer, spoke.Vice Chair Wheeler spoke.A member of the public, Mariana Salgado, addressed the commission. Colin Averill, Civil Engineer, spoke.Vice Chair Wheeler spoke.Colin Averill, Civil Engineer, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Vice Chair Wheeler and Colin Averill, Civil Engineer.Lincoln Lo, Assistant City Engineer, spoke.Vice Chair Wheeler spoke.Colin Averill, Civil Engineer, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Vice Chair Wheeler and Colin Averill, Civil Engineer.A motion was made by Commissioner Dillon, seconded by Commissioner Skye, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Page 4 of 6VIA TELECONFERENCE, 4:00 PMTHURSDAY, OCTOBER 22, 2020CITY OF LONG BEACHSUSTAINABLE CITY COMMISSION MINUTESYes: 7 - Donna Bergeron-Birge, Carla Dillon, Hilda Gaytan, Jenny Novak, Alan Tolkoff, Coby Skye and Morgan WheelerAbsent: 3 - Rey Gonzales, Eric Rock and Sona Coffee1.
